name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there are tasks speculated in this round.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.authentication.retry-count
description: Number of time to retry connecting to KMS on authentication failure

name: dfs.balancer.dispatcherThreads
description:
Size of the thread pool for the HDFS balancer block mover.
    dispatchExecutor

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
description: The amount of memory the MR AppMaster needs.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
    containing the user->group mapping. When this duration has expired,
    then the implementation of the group mapping provider is invoked to get
    the groups of the user and then cached back.
